page.title: 10THE ARMED FORCES
page.content:
THERE ARE A LOT OF R.A.F. CAMPS IN THE AREA OF SLEAFORD.THE NEAREST IS CRANWELL.ONCE MY DAD HAD TO GO TO BELIZE IN SOUTH AMERICA AND WAS AWAY FOR ABOUT 4 MONTHS. DAD ONCE HAD TO GO TO NORTHERN IRELAND JUST AFTER I WAS BORN.I REALISE NOW THAT HE COULD HAVE BEEN KILLED THE GOOD THING ABOUT DAD BEING IN THE{RAF}IS THAT I OFTEN MOVE SCHOOLS.I HAVE ALWAYS FELT AT HOME ON THE FIRST DAY. SO TO SUM UP I THINK IN A WAY THE RAF COULD THINK OF THE WAY THE FAMILIES THINK AND FEEL WHEN A PARENT HAS TO GO AWAY FOR 1 WEEK EVERY SIX WEEKS TO TROUBLESOME AREA
{ BY TARA ALLAN AGE(13) {
